title: The Wild Grasshoppers
description: Regarding the hype of the series 'Sin querer queriendo' on HBO, we take the opportunity to recommend the author's best novel.
content:
Regarding the hype of the series Sin querer queriendo on HBO, we take the opportunity to recommend the author's best novel. With AI assistance, we generated a version of Jack Vettriano's work Billy Boys, in a parodic key of the famous cover by Anagrama publishing house for The Savage Detectives (Anagrama, 1998). Visceral realism bathes in a Mexican coast.

"I have been cordially invited to be part of visceral realism. Of course, I have accepted. There was no initiation ceremony. Better that way." (1998)
